title: Lintern and camera dont works
content: i try to use the camera of the pixel and failed. crush and the same happens to lintern and youtube... for moments thats work.... if the lintern works, the camera works and youtube too .... i cant flashing the same rom  because the oem unlock options are grayed... and update to last beta to android Q and the problems dont be affected... help me... i like thats phone...but the camera bux its so bad
